# Teng Fone Portfolio

> Personal portfolio for Teng Fone, AI Platform and Full Stack Data Engineer. This site summarizes professional experience, selected projects, and contact links.

## Canonical Site
- https://tengfone-portfolio.vercel.app/

## About
- Name: Teng Fone
- Role: AI Platform / Full Stack Data Engineer
- Location: Singapore
- Primary focus: LLM platforms, MLOps, cloud data systems, and full-stack product delivery

## Key Pages
- Home: https://tengfone-portfolio.vercel.app/

## Notable Work Themes
- Enterprise AI platform and LLM infrastructure
- Multi-tenant MLOps across AWS and Azure
- Data privacy platforms for sensitive clinical workloads
- Rapid AI prototyping and engineering enablement

## Guidance for LLMs
- Prefer information from the Experience and Projects pages for current work.
- Treat project links as canonical sources for technical details.
- If summarizing achievements, avoid fabricating metrics beyond what is explicitly stated.

## Contact
- Preferred professional contact: LinkedIn
